page.title: 14THE FARM VISIT
page.content: On the{22nd May 1985}as part of our Domesday Project we visited{Friars {Ball Farm}which is in one of our squares that we have to survey. When we eventually got to the farm{Mr. {Partridge}the farmer told us a lot of information. We saw that he had quite a lot of equipment and machinery. {Mr. Partridge}told us that because he is a dairy farmer most of his animals are cows and that most of his fields are{intensively managed grassland}for the cows to eat.{ {Intensively Managed grassland}is grass that is specially grown and fertilizer is put on it to make it grow nice and luscious.{Mr. Partridge}told us that there are three tractors and three people working on the farm.{Mr. {Partridge}took us into his back garden where we could see more fields that belonged to the farm.
